messages: 0c3114834d62506d71870204edd68376 (03:13): there must be a stupid easy tool to build web gui
18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446 (03:16): do you guys have some pro-tip, some highlight that I should consider to talk about on a presentation about "why you already can use html5?"
e63641f4228ae1e4e0cd725f882dcb7e (03:16): google progressive enhancement
18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446 (03:16): i'm talking about yepnope, modernizr, things like that... and all this new browsers that are focusing teams on html5
18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446 (03:20): new browsers = new versions of browsers.
7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (03:25): 18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446: because this is possible now: http://hacks.mozilla.org/2011/03/webowonder/
7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (03:25): Now seriously, explain how tools like modernizr work, and why a developer should use them

a8a55b0ed5d109692cf27695cd898268 (03:26): I've seen phonegap but it seems to be overkill

4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (03:27): 18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446: some stuff in here that might help http://www.slideshare.net/paul.irish/progressive-advancement-by-way-of-progressive-enhancement

7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (03:35): (follow the trail that comes from the south)

7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (03:43): 18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446: you can explain about pollyfills and how using them you can bring the web of tomorrow to the browsers of yesterday
18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446 (03:43): yeah, i'm doing that :D
7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (03:44): I don't take sides, we need diversity in the browsers, so that they push each other along the way
18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446 (03:44): talking about boilerplate too. we need to make paul and divya wealthy soon.
7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (03:44): Every time a better browser comes out, we developers win!
18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446 (03:44): of course! on this browser wars i think developers have only to win :D

18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446 (03:45): omg! don't you forget I leave in brazil. and have to give 15% of the final cost of all my projects to the govern.
18d23e7e3397f5ffebebd0fd268b2446 (03:45): no problem. I can handle it. I guess.
